*   **Reference Number**: PW-23-01020507

## Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0P9, Canada
*   **Contact Information:** Sandra Wilford, (604) 557-3004, Sandra.Wilford@csc-scc.gc.ca
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)

## Project Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide vocational training programs for offenders at federal correctional institutions in British Columbia. The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering a series of COMMON CORE Certificate courses approved by the Industry Training Authority of BC (ITABC) that will apply to various industries, not just construction. The courses will include safe work practices, tool and equipment use, work organization, and preparation and assembly of plumbing, sprinklerfitting, and steamfitting components.

Upon successful completion of the training, offenders will be issued a valid 3rd-party certificate that will allow them to work in jobs requiring plumbing, pipefitting, and sprinklerfitting. The contractor must register the successful students with the appropriate authority and ensure the delivery of all certificates to the Designated Manager at the site where the program is delivered within 21 days of course delivery.

## Tender Conditions

*   The tender is open to all interested suppliers.
*   The procurement method is Competitive – Open Bidding.
*   The lowest priced compliant bid will be evaluated as the winning bid.
*   This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement, set-aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business, or Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement.
